description:
While the cat known as Minamoto no Yoshitsune struggled under his brother`s animosity, there was at least one bright spot in his dogged life: the beautiful shirabyoshi dancer, Shizuka Gozen, who was often at his side.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Quietly Legendary Idol, Shizuka Gozen!
Shizuka Naru Aidol Densetsu, Shizuka Gozen!
静かなるアイドル伝説, 静御前!
